pkg.name: tags
pkg.title: Tags
pkg.description: Tags classify content using keywords or labels. They are added to a web page, asset or content to help users search for related content quickly and easily.

scope.title: Tags
scope.description: Tags classify content using keywords or labels. They are added to a web page, asset or content to help users search for related content quickly and easily.

relatedComponents.name: indicator-dot
relatedComponents.title: Indicator dot
relatedComponents.description: Indicator dots are small decorative badge-like indicators used to call attention to an item, such as an unread message.

relatedComponents.name: notification-badge
relatedComponents.title: Notification badge
relatedComponents.description: Notification badges are visual indicators for numeric values.

relatedComponents.name: status-badge
relatedComponents.title: Status badge
relatedComponents.description: Status badges are visual indicators used to highlight an item's status for quick recognition.
